doc.title: Wharf Scene and Natives Swimming at St. Thomas, D.W.I
doc.plot: Coal dock scene at Charlotte Amelia, St. Thomas. Tourists are amusing themselves by throwing money to the negro boys, who jump from the dock into the water and fight among themselves, diving to the depth of 25 and 30 feet for the coins. (Taken on the midwinter cruise of the S. S. "Prinzessin Victoria Luise" of the Hamburg-American Line.)
